subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls and the New England Revolution played to a 0-0 tie last night in the opening game of their first-round M.L.S. playoff series at Giants Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J. Jon Conway made three saves for the Red Bulls, and Matt Reis stopped five shots for the Revolution. The teams are playing a home-and-home, goal-aggregate series, so either team can advance to the conference finals with a victory next week.
